parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: GatewayUniqueId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the gateway.

parameters.name: PageNum
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: ResourceStatus
parameters.description:
The resource authorization status. Valid values:

*   true: enabled
*   false: disabled
